text: Deelaa di gowaa e hai godou tigidaumaha ala e dudu, mo godou tigidaumaha ala i golo, godou tigidaumaha ina dahi baahi e madangaholu o godou maluagina, mo godou kisakis, aalaa go nia kisakis ala guu lawa di hagababa go goodou gi Dimaadua, mo nia kisakis aga i lodo goodou manawa donu, mo di kisakis o di ulumadua o godou kau mo goodou siibi.
